message: Turns out this was because of where I placed the include statement for leaflet.html in the "_includes" folder. I moved it higher up and it fixed this issue, but I'm still seeing some milder effects on the code block formatting and page width. It looks like atleast some of this is due to the "flatly" library CSS.
message_html: Turns out this was because of where I placed the include statement for leaflet.html in the “_includes” folder. I moved it higher up and it fixed this issue, but I’m still seeing some milder effects on the code block formatting and page width. It looks like atleast some of this is due to the “flatly” library CSS.
